message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair starting point!
Let's meet in the middle, a fair starting point too!
I'll give you a slightly better offer, but still a good compromise!
I'm willing to compromise, but not that much, let's try again!
I'll meet you halfway, but not all the way to your side!
I'm still willing to compromise, let's try again and get closer!
I'm getting closer to your side, but I'm still not there yet!
I'm not giving up, let's try again and get even closer!
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, finally!
